doc:
Marguerite Marsh https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marguerite_Marsh 0 Marguerite Marsh (April 18, 1888 – December 8, 1925) was an American actress of the silent era. She appeared in 73 films between 1911 and 1923. Early in her career, she was known as Margaret Loveridge. Marguerite_Marsh ( April_18_,_1888 – December_8_,_1925 ) was an_American_actress of the_silent_era . She appeared in 73_films between 1911_and_1923 . Early in her_career , she was_known as Margaret_Loveridge .
